name: Edgar 'Eddie' Blackwood
backstory: A brilliant but reckless archaeologist, Eddie stumbled upon an ancient, forbidden cult while excavating a dig in Miskatonic University. Driven by his insatiable thirst for knowledge, he now finds himself entangled in a web of cosmic horrors.

name: Abigail 'Abby' Turner
backstory: A former journalist turned private investigator, Abby is haunted by a past case that exposed government cover-ups. She now uses her skills to uncover the truth, often finding herself drawn to the occult and the supernatural.

name: Henry 'Hank' West
backstory: An eager and idealistic young police officer, Hank was recently transferred to Arkham to work on a special task force investigating occult crimes. Determined to prove himself, he is unafraid to confront the dark forces he encounters.

name: Li Mei Chen
backstory: A skilled practitioner of Eastern mysticism, Li Mei seeks to protect her people from the malevolent forces that threaten to consume them. She carries a deep grudge against the cultists who destroyed her village.

name: Father Michael Carter
backstory: A compassionate and devoted priest, Father Carter was assigned to Arkham to help the victims of the occult. He carries a deep faith that he can confront the darkness and save souls, even in the face of cosmic horror.
